title: Textile, 1851–63
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller and block printed; glazed
description: Ground decorated in alternate areas by molette, with horizontal minute bars in deep cream color, and moire effect, alternating with wide section with pin stripe ground in same shade. Small naturalistic rose cluster printed over-ground, probably by block - glazed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1851–63.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller and block printed; glazed. 1967-10-46.
